>
> > For details on the removal of the hybrid exp penalty
> > (sort of) look at http://eq.castersrealm.com
> >
>
> Lest we forget that verant has stated bards are not hybrids.....
>also look at this I clipped from the post
>
>This is a balance issue we decided was also necessary to address. If we are
>going to make the statement that class experience penalties should not
>exist, we then have to do it on both ends (with exception to the two classes
>that we've decided to leave as-is).
>
>How much you wanna bet that bards will be one of the "as-is" classes.

I will take any and all action on this bet. The discussion was in regard to CLASS exp
penalty, not HYBRID exp penalty. It was STATED that rogues and warriors had an
experience BONUS, and they are leaving these 2 classes as is.

try and take things in context before whining and complaining.
